examples.korean: The hostages were used as a human shield. 발음듣기 그 인질들이 인간 방패로 이용되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hostages were used as a human shield. 발음

examples.korean: The gunman used the hostages as a human shield. 발음듣기 그 총기범은 인질들을 인간 방패로 이용했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The gunman used the hostages as a human shield. 발음

examples.korean: the ricochet of bricks and bottles off police riot shields 발음듣기 경찰의 진압 방패에 맞아 튀어 나오는 벽돌과 병들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the ricochet of bricks and bottles off police riot shields 발음

examples.korean: Riot police with shields were blocking the demonstrators’ way. 발음듣기 방패를 든 폭동 진압 경찰이 시위대들의 진로를 막고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Riot police with shields were blocking the demonstrators’ way. 발음

examples.korean: The police officer fended off the blows with his riot shield. 발음듣기 그 경찰관은 시위 진압용 방패로 그 타격들을 막았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The police officer fended off the blows with his riot shield. 발음
